meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Michael Herman Diane Lubniewski Tanya Palmer Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1013.

td.p: Michael Herman, an arts management consultant originally from Houston, Texas
Diane Lubniewski, a teacher from Pecksville, Pennsylvania
Tanya Palmer, a media buyer from Kansas City (whose 1-day cash winnings total $10,199)

tr.td: SCIENTISTS
SALADS
AMERICAN INDIANS
ARTISTS
THE OLYMPICS
COLUMBIA
